lines.text:
[as an old man]
Hey, Spike! I've been looking all over for you.
Oh, no, you don't. Not me. Uh-uh. I'm not going back with...

[shouts and throws kitchen object at him]
SPIKE! Get in here! You no-good, worthless bug! What do you mean loafing about here all day with your no-good friend? I cook and slave all day while you sit in that rocking chair! I've had about enough with...

[as she continues ranting, runs to Donald]
Well, what are you waiting for? Come on! Let's get going!
[Donald and Spike run off as Donald laughs]
